document.full_text: the story of david maris, a one-time pharmaceutical analyst for bank of america who became embroiled in a battle with biovail, shows just how broken wall street culture is.
document.title: for a whistle-blower, no good deed goes unpunished
lines_and_colors: the story of david maris, a one-time pharmaceutical analyst for bank of america who became embroiled in a battle with biovail, shows just how broken wall street culture is.
